name: aws-toolkit-vscode
displayName: AWS Toolkit - Amazon Q, CodeWhisperer, and more
description: Including Amazon Q, CodeWhisperer, CodeCatalyst, Application Composer, and support for Lambda, S3, CloudWatch Logs, CloudFormation, and many other services

aws.profile.deprecationMessage: The current profile is now stored internally by the Toolkit.

enumDescriptions: Errors, Warnings, Info, Verbose, and Debug

aws.codeWhisperer.javaCompilationOutput.description: Provide the ABSOLUTE path which is used to store java project compilation results.

viewsWelcome.contents:
Project transformation is complete.
 Downloading the proposed changes...

view/title.when: (view == aws.AmazonQChatView || view == aws.codewhisperer ||  view == aws.amazonq) && aws.codewhisperer.connected
(view == aws.AmazonQChatView || view == aws.codewhisperer ||  view == aws.amazonq) && aws.codewhisperer.connectionExpired

view/item/context.when: view == aws.explorer && viewItem == awsLambdaNode || viewItem == awsRegionNode
view == aws.explorer && viewItem == awsLambdaNode || viewItem == awsRegionNode || viewItem == awsCloudFormationRootNode

keybindings.when: editorTextFocus && editorLangId == asl || editorTextFocus && editorLangId == asl-yaml

scripts.postinstall: npm run generateTelemetry && npm run generateConfigurationAttributes
scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run clean && npm run buildScripts && webpack --mode production && npm run copyFiles
scripts.clean: ts-node ../../scripts/clean.ts dist/ LICENSE NOTICE quickStart* README* CHANGELOG.md
scripts.buildScripts: npm run generateClients && npm run generatePackage && npm run generateNonCodeFiles && npm run copyFiles
scripts.browserWatch: npm run clean && npm run buildScripts && webpack --config webpack.browser.config.js --watch
scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run buildScripts && webpack --mode development && npm run copyFiles
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run buildScripts && tsc -watch -p ./
